title: Attitude-Building Social MOOC for Adult Learners: Project-Based Long-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and general understanding of social phenomena
context.additional_context: Customized design to enhance corporate social responsibility. Induces attitude changes through learner collaboration and real-case analysis.

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate collaborative attitudes improved by over 80% in social equity-related projects within six months.
Learners enhance self-directed learning abilities by writing reflective attitude journals at least twice monthly using digital platforms.
Learners achieve a score of 75 or higher (out of 100) on the Social Responsibility Index (SRI) assessment upon course completion.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
